org.magnos.resource
Interface ResourceListener<R extends Resource>

Type Parameters:
R - The resource type.
public interface ResourceListener<R extends Resource>

A listener of resource allocation and deallocation in a resource pool.

Author:
Philip Diffenderfer

Method Summary
 void onResourceAllocate(ResourcePool<R> pool, R resource)
          Invoked when the pool has allocated a resource because a new resource is required.
 void onResourceDeallocate(ResourcePool<R> pool, R resource)
          Invoked when the pool has deallocated a resource because the pool capacity exceeded the maximum or the resource wasn't needed anymore.
 

Method Detail

onResourceAllocate

void onResourceAllocate(ResourcePool<R> pool,
                        R resource)
Invoked when the pool has allocated a resource because a new resource is required. A new resource is required when the pool is queried via the allocate or populate methods.

Parameters:
pool - The pool which the resource was allocated to.
resource - The resource that has been allocated to the pool.

onResourceDeallocate

void onResourceDeallocate(ResourcePool<R> pool,
                          R resource)
Invoked when the pool has deallocated a resource because the pool capacity exceeded the maximum or the resource wasn't needed anymore.

Parameters:
pool - The pool which the resource was deallocated from.
resource - The resource that has been deallocated from the pool.
